Package com.adidas.connectcore.scv

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ScvApi
    API endpoints of the SCV service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthHeaderInterceptor
    Listen for token expired errors returned by the server, requesting the AccountManager a new token (which will be generated with the previously stored refresh token) and retrying the request.
    BaseBodyInterceptor
    Base class for those body interceptors providing useful method to parse request body
    BaseSCVService  
    ScvApiFactory
    Client class used to build a ScvApi interface implementation.
    ScvApiFactory.Builder  
    SCVInterceptor
    Request interceptor to add clientId and countryOfSite to request body when necessary
    SCVUserService
    SCVUserService client
    SCVUserService.Builder
    Class responsible for creation of SCVUserService instances.
    SCVUserService.PersistentBuilder
    Special implementation of the Builder that stores all the properties on the shared preferences.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConnectScvException
    ConnectException returned by SCV
    SourceIdNotPresentException
